subject: Hockey, Ice
Mumps
lead_paragraph: Crosby tested positive for the mumps on Sunday and will miss at least one more game for Pittsburgh, which is believed to be the sixth N.H.L. team to be affected by the outbreak of the viral disease.
snippet: Crosby tested positive for the mumps on Sunday and will miss at least one more game for Pittsburgh, which is believed to be the sixth N.H.L. team to be affected by the outbreak of the viral disease.
